name: Zibbie On The Run
description:
Zibbie On The Run is a cool, quick, platformer game where you use portals to teleport and get to different areas. The objective to collect wrenches, and fix generators to clear each level. You can kill ghost, and bats by using bullets, and you can kill mushrooms by jumping on it. Collect hearts to regenerate health, and collecting diamonds are optional. Have fun on your adventure. P.S, this isn't the end ;)

CONTROLS

Movement - WASD or ARROW KEYS

Shoot Bullet - X OR SPACE

Fix Generator - F

Enter Portal - E

Enter Door - ENTER

Pause - P
